field.label: Merchant Entity Reference
field.comment:
• Value default is applicable for test environment.
  • To get your production `entity reference` contact your Worldpay Implementation Manager

field.label: Narrative
field.comment: The text that appears on your customer's statement. Used to identify the merchant.

field.label: AccessCheckout Identity
field.comment:
• Please reach out to your Worldpay contact to get Access Checkout Identity.
  • This is mandatory field for all credit card payments.

field.label: Worldpay Plugin Version Used Till Date
Test WebSDK Url
field.comment: Please enter the SDK path provided by Worldpay

field.label: Live WebSDK Url
field.comment: Please enter the SDK path provided by Worldpay

field.label: Payment Methods
field.comment: Diners and Dankort are not supported currently by Worldpay.

field.label: Enable Instant Page Checkout
field.comment: If set to "Yes", Worldpay as payment method will be available during Instant purchase.

field.label: Gateway Name
field.comment: For this detail, You must connect with your Worldpay contact.

field.label: Gateway MerchantId
field.comment: For this detail, You must connect with your Worldpay contact.

field.label: Google MerchantId
field.comment: This field only required for production mode. This can be generated from merchant's Google account

field.label: Apple Pay Certification Key
field.comment: Location of the ApplePay.key.pem. eg. /var/www/html/cert/. Files should be have read access by the webserver

field.label: Apple Pay Certification Path
field.comment: Location of the ApplePay.crt.pem. eg. /var/www/html/cert/. Files should be have read access by the webserver

field.label: Apple Pay Certification Password
field.comment: Password set during the export of p12 file.

field.label: Merchant Name
field.comment: For this detail, You must connect with your Worldpay contact.

field.label: Domain Name
field.comment: eg. mydomain.com

field.label: Time window
field.comment: Orders placed within the entered hours will be considered for synchronization.

field.label: Enable Exemption Engine
field.comment: If set to Yes, transactions may be exempted from SCA, based on real-time risk analysis.

field.comment:
Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, png, gif .
  • Recommended size: Logo size should be (50*30)px and Max upto 50KB.
